paper.title: Genetic optimization of a trading algorithm based on pattern recognition
paper.abstract: In the present paper, a trading strategy based on pattern recognition is optimized by means of a genetic algorithm. The genetic algorithm is used to determine decisions of buy/sell based on the patterns found through time for a portfolio in the stock market. The predominant algorithms used in this work were the K-means clustering algorithm to find the patterns in different time lapses, and the genetic algorithm for optimization. The results are supported by simulations using a selected shares of the Mexican stock market.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是使用遗传算法优化基于模式识别的交易策略，并应用于股票市场的投资组合。这直接涉及投资组合管理领域，因为其研究目标是优化买卖决策以提高投资组合的表现。
